name: OPH_EXAM_DATA
description: Stores ophthalmology exam information documented in the visit.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: OPHTH_BUVA_OD
columns.description: Stores the best uncorrected visual acuity in logMAR notation for the right eye within the visit.

columns.name: OPHTH_BCVA_OD
columns.description: Stores the best corrected visual acuity in logMAR notation for the right eye within the visit.

columns.name: OPHTH_BUVA_OS
columns.description: Stores the best uncorrected visual acuity in logMAR notation for the left eye within the visit.

columns.name: OPHTH_BCVA_OS
columns.description: Stores the best corrected visual acuity in logMAR notation for the left eye within the visit.

columns.name: OPHTH_BUVA_DISP_OD
columns.description: Stores the entered display format for the best visual acuity at distance uncorrected for the right eye.

columns.name: OPHTH_BCVA_DISP_OD
columns.description: Stores the entered display format for the best visual acuity at distance corrected for the right eye.

columns.name: OPHTH_BUVA_DISP_OS
columns.description: Stores the entered display format for the best visual acuity at distance uncorrected for the left eye.

columns.name: OPHTH_BCVA_DISP_OS
columns.description: Stores the entered display format for the best visual acuity at distance corrected for the left eye.
